title: Guard Bot
detail: A guard robot that patrols the building and sends alerts upon encountering suspicious strangers
extended_details:
A robot that is programmed to
1) patrolling a building
2) send alerts to servo when it discovers suspicious strangers is 
3) send warnings during emergencies
4) possibly more fun functions!

parts_and_costs.part: Freenove Ultimate Starter Kit for Raspberry Pi
